subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Nick Dougherty took a three-stroke lead in the Dunhill Links championship yesterday after a six-under-par 66, his best round at St. Andrews, Scotland.The 25-year-old Dougherty had a 17-under 199 total after three rounds at Kingsbarns, Carnoustie and the Old Course at St. Andrew’s.Peter O’Malley shot 69 on the Old Course and was second.The British Open champion Padraig Harrington, Paul Lawrie, Justin Rose and Steve Webster shared third place at 203.The final round will be played today on the Old Course.
